title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours               Guided Tours       Ranger Guided Tours    The park offers a variety of ranger guided tours every year at many of the sites.  Most tours are free to visitors with the exception of the Ranger Guided Canoe/Kayak tour.  Choose a tour from the list below to find out more information about that tour.  Â                Ranger guided tours at Mound City Group               Ranger guided canoe/kayak trips, June & July.
